creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund
inscription:
Inscriptions; Date; Mark
(Listed from top) in pencil, recto: [Le bon ton] [no. 3] [1836] 
in brown ink, recto: [Fichu de guipure] [M. Caruche(?)][Mousseline de ___] [Manteau(?) de Mr. Deperre] [Me Dasse] [Capote(?) ___ de soie paille glacé blanc. Chapeau de Crèpe blanc. [rest illegible]]
title: Two Women with a Little Girl
